sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"翻译，译文"之意。
means: translation ： 普通用词，指从一种语言到另一种语言的翻译。
version可与translation换用，尤指不拘泥于文字的意译，更常指某种作品的一种译文。
paraphrase ： 可指非常自由的解释，不拘泥遣词造句，重在传意。通常指用同样语言深入浅出地解释艰深的句子或段落。

word_mean: 转动：转动某物或改变方向
器官转位：器官或某一部分与其正常位置的相对关系的改变
子宫倾侧失常：妇科学中指子宫位置失常或倾斜，参见flexion
胎位倒转术：产科指手法倒转或改变胎儿在母体内的极位，参见presentation
共轭旋转：眼科指两眼同一方向的共轭旋转，见infraversion与sursumversion，并见duction与vergence

sentence.Network_en: The British government introduced a watered-down version of the proposals.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国政府针对这些提议提出了另一较缓和的版本。

sentence.Network_en: A special remastered version of Casablanca is being released.
sentence.Network_cn: 重新录制的特别版《卡萨布兰卡》发行了。

sentence.Network_en: The second-hand version is a poor copy of the original.
sentence.Network_cn: 盗版版本是对原版的低劣复制。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'translation'): from French, or from medieval Latin versio(n-), from Latin vertere 'to turn'

entry.def: A version of something is a particular form of it in which some details are different from earlier or later forms.

example.ex: Ludo is a version of an ancient Indian racing game...
example.tran: 鲁多是由一种古印度竞赛游戏演变而来。

entry.tran: （某人对某事件区别于他人的）描述，说法
entry.def: Someone's version of an event is their own description of it, especially when it is different to other people's.

example.ex: Yesterday afternoon the White House put out a new version of events...
example.tran: 昨天下午，白宫对事件给出了另一种说法。

example.ex: She and her friends wanted to go public with their version of the incident...
example.tran: 她和朋友们想把他们看到的事情经过公之于众。

means.word_mean: 1. an interpretation of a matter from a particular viewpoint;

sentences.sentence: "his version of the fight was different from mine"

means.word_mean: 2. something a little different from others of the same type;

sentences.sentence: "an experimental version of the night fighter"
"an emery wheel is a modern variant of the grindstone"
"the boy is a younger edition of his father"

means.word_mean: 3. a written work (as a novel) that has been recast in a new form;

sentences.sentence: "the play is an adaptation of a short novel"

means.word_mean: 4. a written communication in a second language having the same meaning as the written communication in a first language
5. a mental representation of the meaning or significance of something
6. manual turning of a fetus in the uterus (usually to aid delivery)

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad向+vers转+e→转向不利的
a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍的, 全体的, 通用的, 宇宙的, 世界的
stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vers转+atile→玩得转,有才能的
vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐
stems_affixes.word_buile: di离开+vers转+ion表名词→转偏离→转向
diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
stems_affixes.word_buile: versatile[adj.通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的]+ity表名词→n.多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

Sentence.sentence: At their best, they are works of art and there is a tactile（触觉的）pleasure in books necessarily lost in e-book versions.
Authors still published in printed versions will be considered important ones
But the worst part is that print version of textbooks are constantly undergoing revisions.
Some version of the Swedish system might work well for a majority of American parents,but the United States is unlikely to fully embrace the Swedish model.
The Sudan version was deadly enough, killing 50% of those it infected.

means.word_mean: (个人对事件的)描述, 说法, 看法

sentences.en: His version of the accident seemed most convincing.
sentences.cn: 他对该事件的叙述似乎最令人信服。

sentences.en: When I have compared the two versions I may write to you again.
sentences.cn: 当我比较两种版本之后, 我可能再次给你写信。

sentences.en: The book was translated into many versions and sold all over the world.
sentences.cn: 这本书被译成多种译本并行销全球。

jushi.english: This dress is a cheaper version of the one we saw in the shop.
jushi.chinese: 这件连衣裙是我们在那家商店看到的那件的廉价仿制品。

jushi.english: When I have compared the two versions I may write to you again.
jushi.chinese: 当我比较两种版本之后,我可能再次给你写信。

jushi.english: Did you read the whole book or only the abridged version?
jushi.chinese: 你读的是全书还是节略本?
